Koishi:StingingMind.NAME: Stinging Mind
Koishi:StingingMind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Terror twice.

Koishi:DreadfulBlow.NAME: Dreadful Blow
Koishi:DreadfulBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Terror. NL Force target enemy to NOT attack this turn.

Koishi:ReflexRadar.NAME: Reflex Radar
Koishi:ReflexRadar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL attacking enemies.

Koishi:SubconsciousSweep.NAME: Subconscious Sweep
Koishi:SubconsciousSweep.DESCRIPTION: Id. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Koishi:ImGoingToCallYouNow.NAME: I'm Going to Call You Now
Koishi:ImGoingToCallYouNow.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Terror to ALL enemies. NL Add So Answer the Phone to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:ImGoingToCallYouNow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Terror to ALL enemies. NL Add So Answer the Phone+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:SoAnswerThePhone.NAME: So Answer the Phone
Koishi:SoAnswerThePhone.DESCRIPTION: Double ALL enemies' Terror. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:SoAnswerThePhone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple ALL enemies' Terror. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:PerfectMindControl.NAME: Perfect Mind Control
Koishi:PerfectMindControl.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever an enemy deals damage or applies a debuff, a random enemy receives it instead. Whenever an enemy applies a buff, you receive it instead. Whenever an enemy gains Block or heals HP, you receive it as well. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:PerfectMindControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, whenever an enemy deals damage or applies a debuff, a random enemy receives it instead. Whenever an enemy applies a buff, you receive it instead. Whenever an enemy gains Block or heals HP, you receive it as well. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:EmbersOfLove.NAME: Embers of Love
Koishi:EmbersOfLove.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to NOT attack this turn. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:EmbersOfLove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to NOT attack this turn.

Koishi:PhilosophyOfTheDespised.NAME: Philosophy of the Despised
Koishi:PhilosophyOfTheDespised.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to attack this turn. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:PhilosophyOfTheDespised.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Force ALL enemies to attack this turn.

Koishi:ReleaseOfTheId.NAME: Release of the Id
Koishi:ReleaseOfTheId.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random Id cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:ReleaseOfTheId.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random upgraded Id cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:PredatoryInstincts.NAME: Predatory Instincts
Koishi:PredatoryInstincts.DESCRIPTION: Id. NL Apply !M! Terror to ALL enemies.

Koishi:Bloodlust.NAME: Bloodlust
Koishi:Bloodlust.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Lose [E] [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:GeneticsOfTheUnconscious.NAME: Genetics of the Unconscious
Koishi:GeneticsOfTheUnconscious.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile !Koishi:SecondMagic! times. NL Draw !M! cards.

Koishi:RorschachInDanmaku.NAME: Rorschach in Danmaku
Koishi:RorschachInDanmaku.DESCRIPTION: Id. Gain Block equal to incoming damage.
Koishi:RorschachInDanmaku.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Id. Gain Block equal to incoming damage + 5.

Koishi:JumpScare.NAME: Jump Scare
Koishi:JumpScare.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Terror. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:HeartfeltFancy.NAME: Heartfelt Fancy
Koishi:HeartfeltFancy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Koishi:Whimsy.NAME: Whimsy
Koishi:Whimsy.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
Koishi:Whimsy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

Koishi:Provoke.NAME: Provoke
Koishi:Provoke.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Force target enemy to attack this turn.

Koishi:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Koishi:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Koishi:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Koishi:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Koishi:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Koishi:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Koishi:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Koishi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Koishi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Koishi:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Koishi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Koishi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Koishi:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
